statements: SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT waste_type, quantity FROM biodegradable_waste_data WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT location_geography, collection_date FROM biodegradable_waste_data WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT AVG(quantity) AS average_quantity FROM biodegradable_waste_data WHERE waste_type = 'Food Waste';
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_data WHERE location_geography IS NOT NULL ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT id, location_geography, waste_type, quantity, collection_date FROM biodegradable_waste_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_data WHERE waste_type LIKE '%organic%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM biodegradable_waste_data WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(quantity) AS average_quantity, MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(quantity) AS min_quantity FROM biodegradable_waste_data WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT location_geography FROM biodegradable_waste_data ORDER BY location_geography ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM GIS_Data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, waste_type FROM GIS_Data WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT * FROM Waste_Analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT location_id, methane_level FROM Waste_Analysis ORDER BY methane_level DESC;
SELECT id, location, collection_date FROM GIS_Data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM GIS_Data WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY amount DESC, collection_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, location, waste_type, amount FROM GIS_Data JOIN Waste_Analysis ON GIS_Data.id = Waste_Analysis.location_id WHERE waste_status = TRUE;
SELECT location, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM GIS_Data GROUP BY location HAVING avg_amount > 1000 ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT location, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM GIS_Data GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM GIS_Data WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' AND (waste_type = 'Plastic' OR waste_type = 'Glass') ORDER BY collection_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM GeographicInformationSystemData;
SELECT id, location_name FROM GeographicInformationSystemData WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM BiodegradableWasteData WHERE weight >= 100;
SELECT id, analysis_type, recommendation FROM SpatialAnalysisData ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, disposal_method FROM BiodegradableWasteData WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM GeographicInformationSystemData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location_name, longitude FROM GeographicInformationSystemData WHERE latitude > 40.0;
SELECT * FROM BiodegradableWasteData WHERE disposal_method = 'Composting' ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT analysis_type, recommendation FROM SpatialAnalysisData WHERE analysis_type LIKE 'Environmental%';
SELECT * FROM SpatialAnalysisData WHERE recommendation IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeospatialData WHERE id = 1
SELECT location, latitude FROM GeospatialData WHERE longitude > 0
SELECT id, location, latitude, longitude FROM GeospatialData WHERE latitude < 0
SELECT * FROM GeospatialData WHERE id IN (2, 3, 5)
SELECT location FROM GeospatialData WHERE latitude >= 0
SELECT * FROM GeospatialData WHERE latitude > 30 ORDER BY longitude DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, location FROM GeospatialData WHERE longitude < -100
SELECT * FROM GeospatialData WHERE latitude BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT location, latitude, longitude FROM GeospatialData WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY location
SELECT id, location FROM GeospatialData WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -80
SELECT * FROM GIS_Data;
SELECT location, latitude, longitude FROM GIS_Data WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT id, location_id, collection_date FROM Waste_Data ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_type, result FROM Spatial_Analysis WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM Users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM GIS_Data ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM GIS_Data WHERE waste_type='Plastic' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT Ud.username, Ud.email, P.plan_details FROM Users Ud JOIN Planning P ON Ud.user_id = P.id;
SELECT Wd.location_id, Wd.collection_date, Wd.is_biodegradable, G.location FROM Waste_Data Wd JOIN GIS_Data G ON Wd.location_id = G.id WHERE Wd.weight > 100 ORDER BY Wd.collection_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT A.analysis_type, A.analysis_date, S.result, G.latitude, G.longitude FROM Spatial_Analysis A JOIN GIS_Data G ON A.id = G.id JOIN Waste_Data Wd ON G.id = Wd.location_id JOIN Planning P ON G.id = P.id WHERE P.plan_date='2022-12-31';
